titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PROCEDURE DATE (PRIMARY JOINT REPLACEMENT) - Description

body.p: PROCEDURE DATE (PRIMARY JOINT REPLACEMENT) is the same as Data Element PROCEDURE DATE .
PROCEDURE DATE (PRIMARY JOINT REPLACEMENT) is the date of the Primary Joint Replacement Surgery and is recorded for Revision Joint Replacement Surgery items.
If the exact primary operation date is not known:

div.p: the year is recorded if available
'Not Available' is selected if the date is not known.
